Fix token of CRON URLs for some shops

7.7.0: Page Cache: Optimization of the cache key concerning the user groups so it is much more efficient

7.5.0: Page Cache: Improve the country contexts (creates different caches only when necessary)

Update cccCss prototype to latest one

3.01: Fix cache refreshment for single language stores

2.70: Fix country detection (when detected with browser settings)

2.64: Fix the check of overrides activation

2.53: Improve speed and robustness of dynamic modules display
2.51: Add Readme.md, move js, css and img to views directory

2.35: Prevent AJAX requests to be cached

2.2: Fix a 'white page' issue when module is disabled
2.0: Hit statistics to know how the cache is efficient

Save cache files in multiple directories to avoid filesystems to slow down
Enable auto-update so you can update your module from your backoffice
Fix an issue with prices-drop, new-products and best-sales controllers

1.6: Hook class updated to merge with version 1.5.4.1
